Key Match Events: DL Hall worked seven scoreless innings in the best start of his career
Willy Adames and Rhys Hoskins each homered and drove in three runs
The Brewers scored 10 runs in the ninth inning
Willy Adames hit a three-run homer in the ninth inning
William Contreras hit a two-run homer in the ninth inning
Blake Perkins hit a sacrifice fly in the ninth inning
Post-Match Reflections: Brewers manager Pat Murphy praised DL Hall's performance
David Bell, the Reds' manager, acknowledged the Brewers' dominance
Miscellaneous Highlights: Rhett Lowder made his major league debut for the Reds
The Brewers stole four bases, two by Brice Turang
TJ Friedl made a catch in the third inning
